name: controller(_:didChange:atSectionIndex:for:)
desc: Notifies the receiver of the addition or removal of a section.
declaration:
optional func controller(_ controller: NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, 
               didChange sectionInfo: NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo, 
          atSectionIndex sectionIndex: Int, 
                     for type: NSFetchedResultsChangeType)
